casebody.data:
Michigan Territory, in supreme court

Robert Smart vs James Henry

Mr Audrain Clk S. Court

Sir—

You are hereby requested to issue a ca: sa: upon the Judg4 entered this Term Robert Smart vs James Henry ret. at the next term of Supreme Court for this Territory—Yours &c. Robert Smart

Detroit Ocr 10. 1811—

[In the handwriting of Solomon Sibley]
